ComicInfo.Summary:
Uriel arrives in Pella only to witness a group of giants wreaking havoc on the village locals. Left with no other choice, she decides to reveal herself to humanity and protect the people of Pella. Meanwhile, Azrael's motivations are brought to light as she is rushed to her lair to recover from her wounds after the violent battle with Shammah, Gabrielle, and Michael. But Azrael is not the only one recovering, Michael and Gabrielle arrive at the House of David and are introduced to the protectors of King David's bloodline.
